select count(*) from tbl_user where email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user( id, loginAct, name, loginPwd, email, lockState, deptno, allowIps, createTime, editTime, editBy ) values ( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{name}, #{loginPwd}, #{email}, #{lockState}, #{deptno}, #{allowIps}, #{createTime}, #{editTime}, #{editBy} )
mapper.select: select * from tbl_user where loginAct = #{loginAct} and loginPwd = #{loginPwd}
